title: What are the requirements for a B.Ed? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, Eligibility criteria for B.Ed :- The student must have completed graduation or Post graduation with min. 50 % from a recognized university of India. Admission criteria for B.Ed :- Various states and universities conduct their entrance examinations for admitting the most deserving students in the course. Few universities take admission on the basis of online counselling without entrance exams. Direct admission in B.Ed from state government university without Entrance exam.

If You want to do B.ED. After B.A(Bachelor of Arts), B.Sc(Bachelor of Science) or B.Com(Bachelor of Commerce) As for as I know, If you have to teach Math you have to do B.Com. If you Want to teach Science you have to do B.Sc. B.Ed you can teach Primary & up to high school student.
